[[«فَرَوْحٌ ...»: حرف (ف) برای تعقیب است. یعنی انسان مؤمن همین که در آستانه مرگ قرار گرفت، رَوح و رَیحان و جنت نعیم بهره او می‌گردد. اغلب آیات قرآنی دالّ بر این است که انسان از نخستین لحظات عالم برزخ، به نعمتها و لذتها و خوشیها می‌رسد، و یا به نقمتها و مجازاتها و ناخوشیها گرفتار می‌گردد (نگا: مؤمنون / 100، انعام / 93، فصّلت / 30). «رَوْحٌ»: راحت و آسایش. «رَیْحَانٌ»: گلهای خوشبو (نگا: رحمن / 12). «جَنَّتُ نَعِیمٍ»: (نگا: شعراء / 85).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: رهایش و گشایش است و بهشت پرناز و نعمت‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: در رَوح و ریحان و بهشت پرنعمت است!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس آرامشی و روزیی و بهشت نعمت‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس آسانى- هنگام مرگ و پس از آن در برزخ و رستاخيز- و روزى جاودانى- يا گياه خوشبو- و بهشت پُر نعمت [فراروى اوست‌].

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: در نتیجه (در) آسایش و راحت و بهشت پُرنعمت (است).

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: There will be peace and plenty, and gardens of tranquility for him.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Then is relief, and flowers – and Gardens of peace.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: there shall be repose and ease, and a Garden of Delight;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: For him shall be comfort, and fragrance and a Garden of Delight.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: (There is for him) rest and provision, and a Garden of delights (Paradise).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Then happiness, and flowers, and Garden of Delights.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: then happiness and delight and Gardens of Bliss are his.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Then Rawh, Rayhan and a Garden of Delights.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Then breath of life, and plenty, and a Garden of delight.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: then ease, abundance, and a garden of bliss.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: there shall be calmness and ease, a Garden of Delight.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: it will have rest, happiness, and a beautiful Paradise.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Then happiness and bounty and a garden of bliss.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Farawhun warayhanun wajannatu naAAeemin

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: then for him there shall be comfort and plenty and a Garden of Bliss;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: (There is for him) Rest and Satisfaction, and a Garden of Delights.

verses.text: وَ أَمَّا إِنْ‌ کَانَ‌ مِنْ‌ أَصْحَابِ‌ الْيَمِينِ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و اگر از سعادتمندان باشد،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اما اگر از اصحاب سعادت باشد:

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و امّا اگر از اهل سعادت باشد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و اما اگر از ياران راست باشد،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و اگر از اصحاب یمین است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و امّا اگر از یاران سمت راستیها باشد. [[«أَصْحَابِ الْیَمِینِ»: همان اصحاب المیمنة هستند (نگا: واقعه / 8).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اما اگر از اصحاب یمین باشد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: امّا اگر از اصحاب یمین باشد،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و اما اگر بود از یاران راست‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اما اگر از ياران دست راست- اهل سعادت- باشد،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و اما اگر از راستان و برکت‌یافتگان باشد؛

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: If he is of those of the right hand,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And if he is of those on the right, –

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and if he be a Companion of the Right:

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And if he be of the fellows on the right hand,

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And if he (the dying person) be of those on the Right Hand,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And if he is one of those on the Right.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: And if he is one of the People on the Right,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And if he be of those on the right,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And if he is of those on the right hand,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: And if he be of the People of the Right Hand,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: If he is a Companion of the Right

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And if he was of the companions of the right,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: If it is of the people of the right hand,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And if he is one of those on the right hand,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waamma in kana min ashabi alyameeni

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and if he is of those who are on the Right,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And if he be of the Companions of the Right Hand,

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: [به او گفته می شود:] از سوی سعادتمندان بر تو سلام باد.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: پس تو را از اصحاب سعادت سلام است.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس [به او گفته شود:] تو را از جانب اهل سعادت سلامى است

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: از ياران راست بر تو سلام باد.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: پس (وی را بشارت دهید که) تو را (از هر رنج و درد و الم) ایمنی و سلامت است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: از سوی یاران سمت راستیها درودت باد! [[«سَلامٌ لَّکَ»: درودت باد! مخاطب شخص محتضری است که پس از تحویل جان به جان آفرین، به میان اصحاب الیمین خواهد رفت. در دم مرگ سلام دوستان همیشگی او را بدو می‌رسانند.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پس سلام بر تو باد از اصحاب یمین‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: (به او گفته می‌شود:) سلام بر تو از سوی دوستانت که از اصحاب یمینند!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس سلامی تو را از یاران راست‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس تو را از ياران دست راست سلام است.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس، از این راستان برایت سلامی است.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: There will be the salutation by those of the right hand: "Peace on you.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Then upon you is the greetings of peace (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), from those on the right.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: 'Peace be upon thee, Companion of the Right!'

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Then: peace Unto thee, for thou art of those on the right hand.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Then there is safety and peace (from the Punishment of Allah) for (you as you are from) those on the Right Hand.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Then, “Peace upon you,” from those on the Right.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: he will be welcomed by the words: “Peace to you” from the People on the Right.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Then Salam (peace) to you from those on the right.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Then (the greeting) "Peace be unto thee" from those on the right hand.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: then [he will be told,] ‘Peace be on you, from the People of the Right Hand!’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: (he will be greeted with): 'Peace be upon you, Companion of the Right'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: it will be with the people of the right hand, living in peace and security.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Then peace to you from those on the right hand.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Fasalamun laka min ashabi alyameeni

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: he will be greeted with, "Peace be to you," by those on the Right.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: (For him is the salutation), "Peace be unto thee", from the Companions of the Right Hand.

verses.text: وَ أَمَّا إِنْ‌ کَانَ‌ مِنَ‌ الْمُکَذِّبِينَ‌ الضَّالِّينَ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و اما اگر از انکار کنندگان [حقایق و] گمراه باشد،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اما اگر از تكذيب‌كنندگان گمراه باشد،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و امّا اگر از تكذيب كنندگان گمراه باشد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و اما اگر از دروغزنان گمراه است،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و اما اگر از منکران و گمراهان است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و امّا اگر (شخص محتضر) از جمله‌ی تکذیب‌کنندگان و گمراهان (دست چپی) باشد. [[«الْمُکَذِّبِینَ الضَّآلِّینَ»: مراد سمت چپیها است (نگا: واقعه / 9).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اما اگر از منکران گمراه باشد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: امّا اگر او از تکذیب‌کنندگان گمراه باشد،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و اما اگر بود از تکذیب‌کنندگان گمراهان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اما اگر از دروغ‌انگاران گمراه باشد،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و اما اگر از تکذیب‌کنندگان گمراه بوده است،

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: But if he is of the deniers and the errants,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And if he is from the deniers, the astray, –

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: But if he be of them that cried lies, and went astray,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And if he be of the beliers, the erring,

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: But if he (the dying person) be of the denying (of the Resurrection), the erring (away from the Right Path of Islamic Monotheism),

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: But if he is one of the deniers, the mistaken.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: And if he is one of those who give the lie (to this Message) and go astray,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: But if he be of the denying, the erring,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: But if he is of the rejecters, the erring,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: But if he be of the impugners, the astray ones,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: But, if he is of those who belied, and went astray,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: If it is of those who have rejected the Truth and have gone astray,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And if he is one of the rejecters, the erring ones,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waamma in kana mina almukaththibeena alddalleena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: But if he is one of those who rejected [the truth] and went astray,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And if he be of those who treat (Truth) as Falsehood, who go wrong,

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: پذیرایی از او با آب جوشان است،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: به آب جوشان مهمانش كنند،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس [وى را] ضيافتى از آب جوشان

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پس با آبى جوشان پذيرايى خواهد شد،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: نصیبش حمیم جهنم است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: (همین که محتضر مرد) با آب جوشان از او پذیرائی می‌گردد! [[«نُزُلٌ»: (نگا: واقعه / 56). «حَمِیمٍ»: (نگا: واقعه / 54).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پیشکش [او] از آب‌جوشان است‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: با آب جوشان دوزخ از او پذیرایی می‌شوید!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس پیشکشی از آب جوشان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس پذيرايى [او] از آبى جوشان است.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس (برایشان) مهمانخانه‌ای از مایعی جوشان است؛

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: The welcome will be boiling water

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Then his reception is the hot boiling water.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: there shall be a hospitality of boiling water

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Then an entertainment of boiling water.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Then for him is entertainment with boiling water.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Then a welcome of Inferno.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: then he will be served boiling water,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Then for him is an entertainment with Hamim.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Then the welcome will be boiling water

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: then a treat of boiling water

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: there shall be a hospitality of boiling water,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: its dwelling will be boiling water

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: He shall have an entertainment of boiling water,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Fanuzulun min hameemin

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: he will be welcomed with boiling water.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: For him is Entertainment with Boiling Water.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و وارد شدن به دوزخ است.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و به دوزخش درآورند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و به دوزخ در آوردن است

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و [فرجامش‌] درافتادن به جهنم است.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و جایگاهش آتش دوزخ است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و به آتش دوزخ فروانداختن و جای دادن در آن است. [[«تَصْلِیَةُ»: فرو انداختن به آتش و جای دادن در آن.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و ورود به جهنم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و سرنوشت او ورود در آتش جهنّم است،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و چشیدن دوزخ‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و به دوزخ در آمدن و سوختن.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و (نیز) افروختن آتشی فروزان.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And the roasting in Hell.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And a hurling into the blazing fire.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and the roasting in Hell.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And roasting in a Blaze.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And burning in Hell-fire.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And burning in Hell.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and will be scorched by the Fire.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And entry in Hellfire.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And roasting at hell-fire.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and entry into hell.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and a roasting in Hell.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And burning in Hellfire

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and the heat of hell fire.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And burning in hell.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Watasliyatu jaheemin

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: He will burn in Hell.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And burning in Hell-Fire.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: [آنچه درباره این سه طایفه بیان شد،] بی تردید این است همان حقّ یقینی.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: اين سخن سخنى راست و يقين است.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: بى‌ترديد، اين همان حقيقت يقينى است

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: اين است همان حقيقت راست [و] يقين.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: این (وعد و وعید) البته یقین و حق و حقیقت است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: قطعاً این (چیزهائی که درباره‌ی پیشگامان و سمت راستیها و سمت چپیها گفته شد) عین واقعیّت است. [[«هذا»: آنچه در این سوره راجع به سه گروه پیشتازان و دست راستیها و دست چپیها آمده است. «حَقُّ الْیَقِینِ»: عین واقعیت. حق و حقیقت. در قرآن عِلْمُ الْیَقِین (نگا: تکاثر / 5) و عَیْنُ الْیَقِین (نگا: تکاثر / 7) و حَقُّ الْیَقِین آمده است. عِلْمُ الْیَقین، خبر راستینی است که انسان آن را می‌شنود و باور می‌دارد. عَیْنُ الْیَقین، آن است که انسان آن را می‌بیند. حَقُّ الْیَقِین، آن است که آن را با حواس ظاهری یا باطنی درک می‌کند. مثلاً اگر شخصی بگوید که در این ظرف سربسته، عسل است و تو هم او را راستگو بدانی، و یا مقداری از عسل بر دور و بر ظرف ریخته شده باشد، این علم‌الیقین است. اگر سرپوش ظرف را بردارند و عسل را در داخل آن ببینی، این عین‌الیقین است. و اگر مقداری را از آن انگشت بزنی و بخوری، این حق‌الیقین است که بالاتر از دوتای نخستین است (نگا: المصحف المیسر).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: این همانا حق‌الیقین است‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: این مطلب حقّ و یقین است!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: همانا این است حقّ یقین‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: هر آينه اين، آن سخن راست بى‌گمان و درست است.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: به‌راستی این همان حق‌الیقین است.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: This is indeed the ultimate truth.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: This is indeed an utmost certainty.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Surely this is the truth of certainty.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Verily this! this is the very truth.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Verily, this! This is an absolute Truth with certainty.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: This is the certain truth.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: That indeed is the absolute truth.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Verily, this! This is an absolute truth with certainty.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Lo! this is certain truth.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Indeed this is certain truth.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Indeed, this is the certain truth.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Indeed, this is the true certainty,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: This is the absolute Truth and certainty.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Most surely this is a certain truth.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Inna hatha lahuwa haqqu alyaqeeni

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: This is indeed the indubitable truth.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Verily, this is the Very Truth and Certainly.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: پس به نام پروردگار بزرگت تسبیح گوی.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: پس به نام پروردگار بزرگت تسبيح گوى.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس به نام پروردگار بزرگت تسبيح گوى

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پس به نام پروردگار بزرگ خود تسبيح گوى.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: پس به نام بزرگ خدای خود تسبیح گوی.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: حال که چنین است، نام پروردگار بزرگ خود را ورد زبان ساز (و سپاسگزار نعمتهای فراوان او باش، و به ستایش وی بپرداز). [[«فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ ...»: (نگا: واقعه / 74).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پس به نام پروردگارت که بزرگ است، تسبیح بگوی‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: پس به نام پروردگار بزرگت تسبیح کن (و او را منزّه بشمار)!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس تسبیح گوی به نام پروردگار بزرگ خویش‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس نام پروردگار بزرگت را به پاكى ياد كن.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس به نام پروردگار بزرگت تسبیح گوی.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Then praise your Lord, the most supreme.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) proclaim the Purity of the name of your Lord, the Greatest.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Wherefore hallow thou the name of thy Lord, the Mighty!

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: So glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Magnificent

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: So glorify the name of your Great Lord.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: So, glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Therefor (O Muhammad) praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: So celebrate the Name of your Lord, the All-supreme!

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: So exalt the Name of your Lord, the Great.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Great One.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Therefore glorify the name of your Lord, the Great.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Fasabbih biismi rabbika alAAatheemi

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Supreme.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: So celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme.
